alert.note: Alert for Lower Treasure Valley; Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 1:42PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Ada, southwestern Payette, southwestern Elmore, Canyon, north central Owyhee and southwestern Gem Counties through 215 PM MDT... At 141 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Nyssa to near Melba to near Oreana. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Boise, Nampa, Caldwell, Parma, Meridian, Eagle, Kuna, Garden City, Star, Middleton, Nyssa, New Plymouth, Greenleaf, Notus, Melba, Swan Falls, and Blacks Creek Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Lower Treasure Valley; Upper Treasure Valley
